info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN INDIANA... NORTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND AND SOUTHERN ARMSTRONG COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ford City, or 7 miles south of Kittanning, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Indiana, Ford City, Leechburg, West Leechburg, Rural Valley, Hyde Park, North Vandergrift, Manorville, Ford Cliff, Elderton, Creekside, and Lenape Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
